name: Candy Smasher
description:
What is candy smasher ? The major inspiration for this game comes from prop hunt where you basically play hide and seek with objects.

How about a counch game in local multiplayer where you try to find out who is who and defeat everyone by spiting on them !

This is the proposition of this small game made by students in their early stages.

Choose the players and get started to smash some candies, there is the hunter and at least one other player who have to hide.

The build support a single controller for the lucky player, if you havn't got any controller you can just use a single keyboard for 3, enjoy !
